t: Amazon | E-commerce, Amazon Web Services, History, & Facts | Britannica Money
s: 2 days ago - Although the company is best known among consumers for its retail platform, a majority of its operating profits (as of 2024) come from its cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services (AWS). Amazon is also emerging as a leader in generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) with its Bedrock platform.

t: Grow Your Amazon Business Online | Amazon Seller UAE

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
